author: kmondal
body:
1. Two new producer (ElectronTrackProducer & MuonTrackProducer) have been added to look for the 
   properties of the tracks associated with muons and electrons coming from Z.
2. Some new histograms related to residual, validHits, lostHits have been added to the analyzer 
   StandaloneTrackMonitor.
3. In the test area new configs, LSF batch scripts, root macros to produce the plots have been kept.
title: Changes to DataMC comparison tool package
